item.title: Night on Earth
item.description: Last weekend I finished “Night on Earth” a Netflix documentation about animal life during the night, filmed with super light sensitive cameras making the darkest night look like early evening; It’s an interesting look into the night and quite entertaining and educating. You can find the documentation here on Netflix ★★★★☆
